name: ctc-guarantee-balance-postman
description: CTC Guarantee Balance API Postman Tests

scripts.smoke-test: newman run CTC_Guarantee_Balance.postman_collection.json --folder "CTC_GB_Smoke Tests" -e Local.postman_environment.json --reporters cli,junit,htmlextra --reporter-junit-export target/smoke-test-reports/junit.xml --reporter-htmlextra-export target/smoke-test-reports/smoke-test-report.html
scripts.regression-test: newman run CTC_Guarantee_Balance.postman_collection.json --folder "CTC_GB_Regression Tests" -e Local.postman_environment.json --reporters cli,junit,htmlextra --reporter-junit-export target/regression-test-reports/junit.xml --reporter-htmlextra-export target/regression-test-reports/regression-test-report.html
scripts.staging-regression-test: newman run CTC_Guarantee_Balance.postman_collection.json --folder "02_CTC_GB_QA_Stag_Dev_Extr Environment" "CTC_GB_Regression Tests" -e Staging.postman_environment.json --reporters cli,junit,htmlextra --reporter-junit-export target/regression-test-reports/junit.xml --reporter-htmlextra-export target/staging_regression-test-reports/regression-test-report.html
scripts.test: npm run smoke-test && npm run regression-test
